batch_warning.title: Confirmation
batch_warning.description: There is no item selected. Please review the added material and press the save button on the batch to save the changes.

modal_companion.title: Lanjut tanpa Material Pendamping?
modal_companion.description: Dengan mengklik <bold>Ya</bold>, Anda menyetujui bahwa Anda memproses materi ini tanpa material pendamping berikut?
